coretype.name: Length
coretype.abstraction: The Length type represents a physical length. Lengths are often specified as a scalar times a unit of length.
coretype.construction:
The syntax to specify a length is
floatidentifier
where identifier must refer to a defined unit of length.

coretype.name: Coord2D
coretype.abstraction: The Coord2D type is a pair of Length ordinates.
coretype.construction:
The syntax to construct a coordinate object is
( Length, Length )
